actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Senate Committee on Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to refer S.1335 entitled "A bill for the relief of the Menominee Indian Tribe of Wisconsin" to the Chief Judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 1335 (a bill for the relief of the Menominee Indian Tribe of Wisconsin) to the Chief Judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

titles.title: A resolution to refer S.1335 entitled "A bill for the relief of the Menominee Indian Tribe of Wisconsin" to the Chief Judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.
